content.plan:
1. Navigate to https://www.nike.com/in/ and wait for the homepage to fully load. Verify visual signals: ['Nike', 'Search', 'Bag Items', 'Men', 'Women', 'Kids', 'Sale', 'SNKRS']. Close any promotional popup or banner if present (look for close symbols like '×' or 'X') and confirm it is closed.
2. Click the search icon (or focus the search input) and verify the search field is visible (expected signals: ['Search', 'magnifier', 'gn-search-input']).
3. Type "black running shoes" into the search field, submit the query, and verify the results page loads (expected signals: ['Results', 'products', 'Found']).
4. Ensure the search results display matching products (expected signals: ['Running Shoes', '₹', 'Add to Cart', 'MRP']). Click the first matching black running shoe product and verify the product detail page loads (expected signals: ['Product Details', 'Description', 'Size', 'Available']).
5. On the product detail page, verify size options are displayed (expected signals: ['Size', '7', '8', '9', '10', '11', 'Add to Bag']). Check that size "10" is listed as available (expected signals: ['10', 'Available']). Select size "10" (expected signal: ['10', 'Selected']).
6. Click the "Add to Bag" button and verify the addition succeeds (expected signals: ['Added', 'Success', 'View Bag']).
7. Navigate to the cart (bag) page and verify the cart displays the product with size "10" and quantity 1 (expected signals: ['Bag Items', 'Checkout', 'Black Running Shoes', 'Size 10']).
content.next_step: Using the browser helper, navigate to "https://www.nike.com/in/", wait until the homepage is fully loaded, then verify that visual elements ['Nike','Search','Bag Items','Men','Women','Kids','Sale','SNKRS'] are present. If a promotional popup or banner appears, locate a close button (e.g., '×' or 'X') and click it, then confirm the popup is no longer visible. Completion criteria: homepage loaded, required visual signals confirmed, and any popup closed.
